name: BLOOMY
description:
BLOOMY is a top-down action tree-shootin’ fruit-collectin’ game! Play as a young farmer toughing it out in the harsh Australian desert as you try to keep your fruit trees alive. Collect fruit to increase your water supply while avoiding rotten fruit that decreases your overall score. Pick up as much fruit as possible to beat out the rough climate! Watch out for the camels, though…

Features
  • Colorful, animated pixel sprites
  • Fast-paced gameplay
  • Short and replayable instantly
